title: Windows 7 Ultimate AIO 22in1 ESD en-US Aug 2015 {Generation2}

[ Both Activators Potential False Positive Virus Alarm ]

[ INSTALLATION & INFORMATION ]

* NOTE! A boot.wim from Win 8 is used to get Win7 to work with ESD format.
* This makes setup resemble Win 8, but it is 100% Win7.

* No upgrades, only clean installs.

* Create bootable USB (highly recommended) with Rufus,

* (attached) or burn to DVD at slow speed.

* Pre-Activated index will auto-reboot to complete the activation.
